title: pAlayamAn srI gOpAla
sahitya:
pAlayamAm shrI gOpAlabAla

anupallavi

 shIla hiraNmaya cEla kucEla pAla

caraNam 1

 suranuti pAtra sundara gAtra parama pavitra bhavya caritra 
pAra rahita samsAra mahAbdhi tAra kalmaSa nivAra parAtpara
 
caraNam 2

 vArija nAbhA krUra varada shruti sAra yashOda kumAra ghrNAkara 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata hrdaya vihAra
